by.horsego.service

Class HorseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.horsego.service.HorseService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service

    public class HorseService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service
    Class for working with horse services. Implements the interface Service To get an instance of this class call the method ServiceFactory.getHorseService() on an object of the ServiceFactory class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mikita Masukhranau
    See Also:
    Service, ServiceFactory

    • Method Detail

      • getHorsesForTable

        public java.util.Map<Horse,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> getHorsesForTable()
                                                                         throws ServiceException
        The method returns a map with the participant's key object and a list of the id of not played games in which the participant participates in. For sorting use HorsesTableComparator, which sorts game numbers from larger to smaller.
        Returns:
        map with the participant's key object and a list of the id of not played games in which the participant participates in
        Throws:
        ServiceException
        See Also:
        HorsesTableComparator

      • isHorseDeleted

        public boolean isHorseDeleted(int horseId)
                       throws ServiceException
        The method delete the participant. Delete the user bets on a participant in not played games and returns them money in the method BetService.isHorseBetsDeleted(Horse, List) (bets table), delete this participant bet types for not played games in the method GameService.isGameBetsDeleted(Game, Horse) (game_bets table), delete a participant from not played games in the method GameService.isGameHorseDeleted(int, int) (game_horses table), delete the participant (horses table).
        Parameters:
        horseId -
        Returns:
        true, if horse deleted
        Throws:
        ServiceException
        See Also:
        BetService.isHorseBetsDeleted(Horse, List), GameService.isGameBetsDeleted(Game, Horse), GameService.isGameHorseDeleted(int, int)
